name: XCTOSSignpostMetric
desc: A metric to record the time that a performance test spends executing a signposted region of code.

items.name: init(subsystem: String, category: String, name: String)
items.desc: Creates a metric to record a specific signpost.

items.name: class var customNavigationTransitionMetric: XCTMetric
items.desc: A metric that records the duration of custom navigation transitions between views.

items.desc: A metric that records scroll-dragging and deceleration animations.
